long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of interruptions while taking quizzes on Stuff? Say goodbye to those pesky modals that disrupt your flow! Our extension ensures a seamless quiz experience by automatically removing the modal on page load. Dive straight into your quiz without the hassle of clicking out on every page. Enhance your productivity and focus on acing those quizzes hassle-free with our Modal Remover for Stuff Quiz.
